author: Anonymous Calc
title: Cannot register for lab section
question:
I recently moved into the course from the waitlist, but cannot register for a lab section on my own as I took the course last semester.
who would be the best person to contact regarding this issue?
student_answer: You should email undergrad-info@cs.ubc.ca with your situation and they'll send you a form you need to fill with the details of the lab section you need to register in. Once you send it back to them, they'll manually register you for the lab.
